entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 28 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 28 by morning. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 25. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 34 in the evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023
